title: kaasicchedhE
sahitya:
kAsiccedE goppAyenurA kalilO rAjulaku



anupallavi



 (hari) dAsulu sEvimparanucu prabhuvulu daya mAniri paramencaka bOyiri



caraNam 1



 rAjAngamu kOraku nAlgu jAtula rakSaNa para sukhamO

      rAjAsulai sanmArgamerugaka parAku sEya ghanamO



caraNam 2



 A janmamu golicE vipra varulakAnandamu galadO

      tyAgarAja vinuta nI mAya gAni nIraja nayana sujanagha vimOcana
